adjectives.description: announceable (comparative more announceable, superlative most announceable)

examples: The pilot with all the self-assurance in the world walks down the aisle enters the cockpit and announces their destination, altitude, and whatever else is announceable.

entries.meaning: (informal) A positive-sounding news item suitable for public announcement; a sound bite.
examples: I was in Don's office to talk about the day's “announceables,” as we called them — on that day, the things Ontario Liberal Party Leader Dalton McGuinty was saying about health care.
